pkgmetadata.longdescription: # crownstone-lib-python-coreThis is the core of the python lib. It contains shared classes, definitions and utils. This is not intended for direct use by externalparties. Take a a look at the specialized libraries for your purpose:- https://github.com/crownstone/crownstone-lib-python-uart- https://github.com/crownstone/crownstone-lib-python-ble- https://github.com/crownstone/crownstone-lib-python-cloud- https://github.com/crownstone/crownstone-lib-python-sseIf you wish to install all crownstone python libraries, take a look at our [tutorial](./docs/TUTORIAL_VENV_SETUP.md).
